Collect and save additional performance data This data is a histogram of time spent per API call, and it's being saved as a graph showing what percentage of calls complete in under a certain amount of time (cumulative distribution function) The intent is, this will provide a good mechanism to accurately compare API performance between runs of the simulator. Some of this will be added to the HTML report in the form of graphs.
